column1:
function preload(arrayOfImages) {
            $(arrayOfImages).each(function(){
                $('<img/>')[0].src = this;
                // Alternatively you could use:
                // (new Image()).src = this;
            });
        }
        
        // Usage:
        
        preload([
            'img/imageName.jpg',
            'img/anotherOne.jpg',
            'img/blahblahblah.jpg'
    ]);
